comments.author: sujonali1819
comments.body: Warning for those who want to buy an account that 99% of these sellers surely will ask for a pre-payment, if you pay them mean you lost the fund. Or if you luckily buy an account it's sure that the account will be fought somehow as a changed-hand /brought account. And surely you will be tagged. So It's always better to try to grow your account with the ability that you have. Don't fall into this.
